languages.text: "Вы защитили интересы организации на Футфоле, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}избавив нас{/d} от диктатуры Чорда. Для Касбаллики это значит гораздо больше, чем смерть Владайма. Мы — деловое предприятие, а не кровное братство".

"You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."
languages.original_text: "Вы защитили интересы организации на Футфоле, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}избавив нас{/d} от диктатуры Чорда. Для Касбаллики это значит гораздо больше, чем смерть Владайма. Мы — деловое предприятие, а не кровное братство".

traits.locale_text: "You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by ridding us of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

"You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by ridding us of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

"You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by ridding us of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

"You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

languages.text: 「チョーダの独裁を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}廃する{/d}ことで、あなたはフットフォールにおける我ら組織の利権を守ってくださった。それはカスバリカにとって、ヴラダイムの死以上に重要なことよ。私たちはビジネス事業であって、慈善団体ではないのですから」
languages.original_text: "You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダの独裁を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}廃する{/d}ことで、あなたはフットフォールにおける我ら組織の利権を守ってくださった。それはカスバリカにとって、ヴラダイムの死以上に重要なことよ。私たちはビジネス事業であって、慈善団体ではないのですから」

languages.text: « Vous avez protégé les intérêts de notre organisation à Castel en {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}nous débarrassant{/d} de la dictature de Chorda, un acte bien plus important aux yeux de la Kasballica que la simple mort de Vladaym. Nous sommes une entreprise commerciale, pas une fraternité de sang. »
languages.original_text: "You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez protégé les intérêts de notre organisation à Castel en nous débarrassant de la dictature de Chorda, un acte bien plus important aux yeux de la Kasballica que la simple mort de Vladaym. Nous sommes une entreprise commerciale, pas une fraternité de sang. »

languages.text: “你保护了卡斯巴利卡集团在落脚港的利益，帮助我们{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}摆脱{/d}了库尔达的独裁统治。这对我们而言非常重要，弗拉迪姆的死我们完全不会放在心上。毕竟我们是商业组织，不是什么血仇兄弟会。”
languages.original_text: "You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

traits.locale_text: “你保护了卡斯巴利卡集团在落脚港的利益，帮助我们摆脱了库尔达的独裁统治。这对我们而言非常重要，弗拉迪姆的死我们完全不会放在心上。毕竟我们是商业组织，不是什么血仇兄弟会。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt die Interessen unserer Organisation auf Footfall geschützt, in dem Ihr uns von Chordas Diktatur {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}befreit{/d} habt. Das bedeutet für die Kasballica weitaus mehr als Vladayms Tod. Wir sind ein Geschäftsunternehmen, keine Blutsbruderschaft."
languages.original_text: "You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die Interessen unserer Organisation auf Footfall geschützt, in dem Ihr uns von Chordas Diktatur befreit habt. Das bedeutet für die Kasballica weitaus mehr als Vladayms Tod. Wir sind ein Geschäftsunternehmen, keine Blutsbruderschaft."

languages.text: «Al {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}liberarnos{/d} de la dictadura de Chorda, ha defendido los intereses de nuestra organización en Paso. La Kasballica le da más valor a eso que a la muerte de Vladaym. Somos una empresa comercial, no una hermandad de sangre».
languages.original_text: "You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

traits.locale_text: «Al liberarnos de la dictadura de Chorda, ha defendido los intereses de nuestra organización en Paso. La Kasballica le da más valor a eso que a la muerte de Vladaym. Somos una empresa comercial, no una hermandad de sangre».

languages.text: "Bizi Chorda'nın diktatörlüğünden {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}kurtararak{/d} örgütümüzün Binliman'daki çıkarlarını korudunuz. Kasballica için bunun değeri, Vladaym'ın canından çok daha fazladır. Sonuçta kan kardeşliği değil, ticari bir işletmeyiz."
languages.original_text: "You protected the interests of our organisation on Footfall by {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}ridding us{/d} of Chorda's dictatorship. That means a great deal more to the Kasballica than Vladaym's death. We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity."

traits.locale_text: "Chorda'nın diktatörlüğüne son vererek Binliman'daki örgütümüzün menfaatini korudunuz. Kasballica için bunun değeri, Vladaym'ın canından çok daha fazladır. Sonuçta biz bir kan kardeşliği değil, ticari bir işletmeyiz."
